release.notes:
With obi & 4 page insert with lyrics in Japanese and English.

"No Ball" obi - obi has "Steppin' Out" in gray letters on orange background but not in darker orange "ball". Another issue exists with minor variation to obi, found here: [r=3497074]

Durations as per release: both per labels and lyrics insert.
